history.proof: split. - intro H. induction A as [|y A' IH]. + reflexivity. + simpl. destruct (Nat.eqb x y) eqn:E. * exfalso. apply H. left. hauto lqb: on depth: 3. * apply IH. intro Hnot. apply H. right. apply Hnot. - intro H. induction A as [|y A' IH]. + intro Contra. inversion Contra. + simpl in H. destruct (Nat.eqb x y) eqn:E. * discriminate. * hauto lqb: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference Nat.eqb_eq was not found in the current environment.
[Focus] Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros x A. split. - intro H. induction A as [|y A' IH]. + reflexivity. + simpl. destruct (Nat.eqb x y) eqn:E. * exfalso. apply H. left. rewrite <- Nat.eqb_eq in E. rewrite E. reflexivity. * apply IH. intro Hnot. apply H. right. apply Hnot. - intro H. induction A as [|y A' IH]. + intro Contra. inversion Contra. + simpl in H. destruct (Nat.eqb x y) eqn:E. * discriminate. * apply IH. intro Hnot. apply H. right. apply Hnot.
